metadata.title: CVE-2021-31812 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: In Apache PDFBox, a carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an infinite loopwhile loading the file. This issue affects Apache PDFBox version 2.0.23 andprior 2.0.x versions.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox2-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
libpdfbox-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
